entry.title: Kraft Heinz - Ketchup Kosher - 396 x 26 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kraft Heinz
Type: FOOD
Price: 54.99

Kraft Heinz - Ketchup Kosher - 396 x 26 ml

A must-have condiment for fried favorites like fried chicken, shrimp, fish sticks, and crab cakes, this sauce will deliver just the right amount of bold flavor! Quickly and easily enhance your seafood dishes with the zesty taste of this classic condiment. Bursting with flavor, this sauce is the perfect fusion of sweet pickle relish and creamy mayonnaise peppered with savory onion powder, herbs, and spices. Made from natural ingredients, this sauce will delight your customers with the classic taste they know and love.

The texture of this condiment is slightly thicker than other sauces. It has a creamy consistency that tastes cool and tangy over grilled or pan-fried chicken, fish and deep fried foods. Save the hassle and kitchen prep time mixing sauce from scratch with this packet that is ready to serve! It still has a homemade taste that's sure to please your seafood-loving patrons. Spice up the menu offerings at your restaurant or diner, and offer this rich, creamy, zesty sauce.

Enhance the flavor of virtually any recipe with the iconic taste of these packets! Its rich, thick consistency is perfect for dipping or spreading while its versatile taste is perfect for complementing a variety of dishes and appetizers. These packets are great for offering at convenience stores, catered events, on the go and quick-service eateries, and allow you to eliminate condiment pumps and portion cups at your self-serve condiment stations to enhance the convenience for your customers and effectively minimize product waste and cleanup of your counters.

entry.title: Heinz - Yellow Mustard VOL-PAK Pouch - 11.35 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heinz
Type: FOOD
Price: 22.99

Heinz - Yellow Mustard VOL-PAK Pouch - 11.35 L

Provide guests with the perfectly smooth and tangy condiment they crave with this French's classic yellow mustard dispensing pouch with fitment. Using the finest ingredients, this mustard is the perfect blend of #1 grade mustard seeds, distilled vinegar, salt, turmeric, paprika, garlic powder, other select spices for a delicious, natural flavor and color. Though yellow mustard tastes milder than other forms of mustard, it still adds the perfect slightly tangy and savory flavor that pairs well with virtually any sandwich, burger, hot dog, or sausage. It can even be mixed with other ingredients like mayonnaise, horseradish, dressings, or BBQ sauce to create signature sauces for your dishes!

Best of all, this mustard comes ready to use in a compatible pump dispenser (sold separately) and each bag features a connecting tube for easy installation. Not only will this dispenser pouch help ensure convenient, mess-free application and reduce product waste, it can also offer hands-free condiment dispensing for your patrons to increase the safety and sanitation of your establishment. Keep this French's classic yellow mustard on hand and treat your customers to the classic taste they grew up with and still love!

entry.title: Dijona - Dijon Mustard Extra Strong in Pail - 5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dijona
Type: FOOD
Price: 22.99

Dijona - Dijon Mustard Extra Strong in Pail - 5 Kg

Ingredients

Water, Mustard Seeds, Spirit Vinegar, Salt, Acid (Citric acid) and Preservative (potassium metabisulphite)

Unbeatable in value and taste, add distinct, savory flavor to a variety of dishes with this Dijon mustard. This lively condiment has more body than the classic yellow mustard, and delivers a bold, yet balanced taste with just the right amount of heat. It is made from stone ground, #1 grade mustard seeds and select seasonings, for a more pronounced, creamy flavor with a naturally thick texture that pairs well with so many other ingredients. Plus, it is free from thickeners, fillers, artificial flavors, colorants, dyes, and high-fructose corn syrup for a clean taste you can feel good about serving.

Use this Dijon mustard to create thick and creamy salad dressings or glazes for your vegetables, combine with bread crumbs and coat your proteins prior to roasting, or even add it to cheese fondue to dip gourmet pretzels in - the options for serving are truly endless! Additionally, the large jug holds an ample supply of mustard so that you have enough on hand to serve guests. It's great for refilling bottles for table service and is designed to easily close for safe storing, eliminating the need to waste time moving product into a different container for storage. Keep this Dijon mustard on hand for all your culinary needs!

entry.title: Heinz - Tomato Ketchup Organic Family Size - 1.5 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heinz
Type: FOOD
Price: 15.99

Heinz - Tomato Ketchup Organic Family Size - 1.5 L

Made from fresh-ripened tomatoes and a special blend of spices, onion powder, and vinegar, this Heinz fancy grade tomato ketchup adds the perfect sweet and slightly tangy flavor to your menu items. Its vibrant red color and sweet, smooth consistency, and juicy taste make it a classic option to dip and enjoy with mild fried foods or to spread on top of sandwiches. From crispy, golden-brown French fries to hearty, old-fashioned burgers, your guests will fall head over heels for this savory condiment.

Heinz ketchup is created from premium tomatoes, grown from a special seed that produces rich tomatoes packed full of nutrients. Heinz ketchup includes essential vitamins, minerals, and lycopene, a healthy antioxidant found in cooked tomatoes.

Buy In Bulk to create perfect portions, or to refill bottles for table service. The is also easy to store as it's designed to easily close for safe storing, eliminating the need to waste time moving product into a different container for storage. Keep this ketchup on hand to make baked beans, marinades, and chili sauce or simply serve it plain to give your customers the condiment they grew up with and still love.

Made from high quality ingredients, you can find their beloved items almost anywhere as they're a great accent to delicious food dishes. Heinz condiments are sure to become a beloved staple in your establishment!

entry.title: PC - Tomato Ketchup Portions - 500 x 8 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: PC Wing's
Type: FOOD
Price: 16.99

PC - Ketchup Portions - 500 x 8 ml

Enjoy the full-flavored, premium quality taste of tomato ketchup in the form of packets! Perfect for a convenient way for customers to apply ketchup to their food on the go, these packets are an essential addition to any condiment station. Made from mature red ripened tomatoes, ketchup is concentrated and homogenized to a silky smooth texture and blended with just the right amount of spices, giving it a pleasantly sweet yet acidic tomato taste that is highlighted by a touch of aromatic onion and distilled vinegar.

The exceptionally fine consistency makes this ketchup ideal for dipping, drizzling, and spreading, and the compact  packet size is an essential feature for take-out and on-the-go customers. Provide these packets on your countertops, tables, and condiment stations as an easy way for your guests to top off their favorite menu items. Whether it's old-fashioned burgers, classic ballpark-style hotdogs, or golden, crispy french fries,  ketchup packets provide the perfect combination of convenience and quality flavor that make them the ideal option for high-volume, fast-paced establishments.

entry.title: Heinz - Ketchup Upside Down Squeeze Bottle - 575 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heinz
Type: FOOD
Price: 3.79

Heinz - Ketchup Upside Down Squeeze Bottle - 575 ml

Made from fresh-ripened tomatoes and a special blend of spices, onion powder, and vinegar, this Heinz fancy grade tomato ketchup adds the perfect sweet and slightly tangy flavor to your menu items. Its vibrant red color and sweet, smooth consistency, and juicy taste make it a classic option to dip and enjoy with mild fried foods or to spread on top of sandwiches. From crispy, golden-brown French fries to hearty, old-fashioned burgers, your guests will fall head over heels for this savory condiment.

Heinz ketchup is created from premium tomatoes, grown from a special seed that produces rich tomatoes packed full of nutrients. Heinz ketchup includes essential vitamins, minerals, and lycopene, a healthy antioxidant found in cooked tomatoes.

Buy In Bulk to create perfect portions, or to refill bottles for table service. The is also easy to store as it's designed to easily close for safe storing, eliminating the need to waste time moving product into a different container for storage. Keep this ketchup on hand to make baked beans, marinades, and chili sauce or simply serve it plain to give your customers the condiment they grew up with and still love.

Made from high quality ingredients, you can find their beloved items almost anywhere as they're a great accent to delicious food dishes. Heinz condiments are sure to become a beloved staple in your establishment!

The upside down, squeeze-style bottle also makes it easy for customers to shake and then dispense the perfect amount of ketchup on their food, according to their individual preferences. Ketchup is a time-honored sauce that guests of your concession stand, restaurant, or cafeteria are sure to love!
